abstract.t: This document defines a protocol for provisioning sessionestablishment data into Session Data Registries and SIP ServiceProvider data stores. The provisioned data is typically used byvarious network elements for session peering.This document describes the Session Peering Provisioning Protocolused by clients to provision registries. The document provides a setof guiding principles for the design of this protocol includingextensibility and independent transport definitions, a basic datamodel and an XML Schema Document.
